definition: not requiring union membership, information that has become public, make available
details:
adjective
- not requiring union membership
- ready for business

- not having been filled
= example: not having been filled
- openly straightforward and direct without reserve or secretiveness
= synonyms: candid, heart-to-heart
- without undue constriction as from e.g. tenseness or inhibition
= example: without undue constriction as from e.g. tenseness or inhibition
- affording free passage or view
= synonyms: clear

- used of mouth or eyes
= example: used of mouth or eyes
= synonyms: opened
- having no protecting cover or enclosure
= example: having no protecting cover or enclosure
- (set theory) of an interval that contains neither of its endpoints
- open and observable

- open to or in view of all
= example: open to or in view of all
- with no protection or shield

- ready or willing to receive favorably
= synonyms: receptive
- accessible to all
= example: accessible to all
= synonyms: unrestricted, unexclusive
- not sealed or having been unsealed
= example: not sealed or having been unsealed
= synonyms: opened
- not brought to a conclusion

- (of textures) full of small openings or gaps

= synonyms: loose
- possibly accepting or permitting
= synonyms: capable, subject
- not defended or capable of being defended
= example: not defended or capable of being defended

noun

= synonyms: surface
- a tournament in which both professionals and amateurs may play
- where the air is unconfined

= synonyms: clear

- display the contents of a file or start an application as on a computer
